text: Lachezar Kotev (Bulgarian: Лъчезар Котев; born 5 January 1998) is a Bulgarian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Arda Kardzhali.Kotev Stats ==International career== ===Youth levels=== In August 2018 he was called up for the Bulgaria U21 team for the 2019 UEFA European Under-21 Championship qualification matches against France U21 and Montenegro U21 to be held on 7 and 11 September 2018.Лъчо Котев: Чест и удоволствие е да бъда национал!
